title: cmd/gc: Compiler syntax error on valid program with a struct literal in an if statement
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

This one fails to compile:
https://play.golang.org/p/sbBFTKOaXt

This one somehow manages to compile and outputs "Equal":
https://play.golang.org/p/JvG6N4F7ju

2. What is the full compiler output?

prog.go:11: syntax error: unexpected { at end of statement

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)

The one used on the go playground.
